targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
    approx_distinct(client_ip) AS client_ip,
    approx_distinct(referrer) AS referrer,
    approx_distinct(http_method) AS http_method,
    approx_distinct(regexp_extract(request_url, '/live/([^/]+)/', 1)) AS channels,
    approx_distinct(regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1)) AS long_token,
    approx_distinct(request_url) AS request_url,
    approx_distinct(http_status) AS http_status,
    approx_distinct(cache_status) AS cache_status,
    approx_distinct(user_agent) AS user_agent,
    approx_distinct(file_type) AS file_type,
    approx_distinct(access_ip) AS access_ip
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet"
WHERE 
    date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
    AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
    AND (
      COALESCE('${client_ip}', '') = '' OR POSITION(',' || CAST(client_ip AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${client_ip}' || ',') > 0
    )
    AND (
      COALESCE('${http_method}', '') = '' OR POSITION(',' || CAST(http_method AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${http_method}' || ',') > 0
    )
    AND (
      COALESCE('${request_url}', '') = '' OR request_url LIKE CONCAT('%', '${request_url}', '%')
    )
    AND (
      COALESCE('${http_status}', '') = '' OR ',' || '${http_status}' || ',' LIKE '%,' || CAST(http_status AS VARCHAR) || ',%'
    )
    AND (
      COALESCE('${cache_status}', '') = '' OR POSITION(',' || CAST(cache_status AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${cache_status}' || ',') > 0
    )
    AND (
      COALESCE('${user_agent}', '') = '' OR POSITION(',' || CAST(user_agent AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${user_agent}' || ',') > 0
    )
    AND (
      COALESCE('${referrer}', '') = '' OR POSITION(',' || CAST(referrer AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${referrer}' || ',') > 0
    )
LIMIT 10000;

SELECT
  date_time,
  timezone,
  client_ip,
  http_status,
  http_method,
  regexp_extract(request_url, '/live/([^/]+)/', 1) AS channels,
  regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) AS long_token,
  request_url,
  user_agent,
  file_type,
  response_time,
  referrer,
  request_bytes,
  response_bytes,
  cache_status,
  access_ip,
  proxy_ip,

    CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END as time
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet"
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range (same pattern as other queries)
  (
    -- If querying current year, use year partition
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If spanning years, include both years
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If querying within same year, include that year
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  -- Filter
AND (
  COALESCE('${client_ip}', '') = ''
  OR POSITION(',' || CAST(client_ip AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${client_ip}' || ',') > 0
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${http_method}', '') = ''
  OR POSITION(',' || CAST(http_method AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${http_method}' || ',') > 0
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${request_url}', '') = ''
  OR request_url LIKE CONCAT('%', '${request_url}', '%')
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${http_status}', '') = ''
  OR 
    ',' || '${http_status}' || ',' LIKE '%,' || CAST(http_status AS VARCHAR) || ',%'
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${cache_status}', '') = ''
  OR POSITION(',' || CAST(cache_status AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${cache_status}' || ',') > 0
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${user_agent}', '') = ''
  OR POSITION(',' || CAST(user_agent AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${user_agent}' || ',') > 0
)
AND (
  COALESCE('${referrer}', '') = ''
  OR POSITION(',' || CAST(referrer AS VARCHAR) || ',' IN ',' || '${referrer}' || ',') > 0
)

LIMIT 10000

title: Alibaba CDN Logs - Raw Table - Athena Table
